attributes.action: increase the resources available for our Armed Forces in Afghanistan by an additional 100 helicopters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to demonstrate to the government the public feeling towards the under resourcing of our armed forces in Afghanistan that is costing the lives of our soldiers.  We petition the government to increase the minimum number of airframes available to troops on a daily basis to be 50 not only to move troops but also resupply F.O.B.s by air to reduce ground vehicle movement as these are vulnerable to IED's and ambushes costing troops lives in inadequate vehicles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
